html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13592024-12-16NRCAN
ActAn Act to amend the Canada–Newfoundland and Labrador Atlantic Accord Implementation Act and the Canada-Nova Scotia Offshore Petroleum Resources Accord Implementation Act and to make consequential amendments to other Acts
SubjectOrder Fixing January 31, 2025 as the Day on Which Certain Provisions of An Act to amend the Canada–Newfoundland and Labrador Atlantic Accord Implementation Act and the Canada-Nova Scotia Offshore Petroleum Resources Accord Implementation Act and to make consequential amendments to other Acts Come into Force
PrecisOrder fixing January 31, 2025, as the day on which amendments to the Canada-Nova Scotia Accord Act expanding the joint management regime to include offshore renewable energy projects, modernizing the existing land tenure regime for offshore petroleum, improving alignment with the Impact Assessment Act (IAA), and establishing new tools to support the Government of Canada’s marine conservation agenda COME INTO FORCE.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order fixing January 31, 2025, as the day on which amendments to the Canada-Nova Scotia Accord Act expanding the joint management regime to include offshore renewable energy projects, modernizing the existing land tenure regime for offshore petroleum, improving alignment with the Impact Assessment Act (IAA), and establishing new tools to support the Government of Canada’s marine conservation agenda COME INTO FORCE.
